parking_areas.title: Parking Areas
parking_areas.no_parking_areas: There is no registered parking areas ...

form.want_to_list: I want to list the parking spaces

area.title: How to create an Area?
area.description: You must choose a name to identify your area. * You must graph on the map with a polygon delimiting the area that you want to represent. * Parking spaces is a field with an approximate value, this value is calculated taking into account a block of 400 m2. * We can indicate if we want these parking spaces to be numbered.

schedule.title: How to create a Schedule?
schedule.description: You must choose a name to identify your schedule. * You must select the working days in which this schedule will be available. * You must select the start time and the end time of your schedule * You must select the currency that will be used in the billing block. * You must indicate the minimum time to generate the billing block. * You must indicate what types of vehicles will be considered in this schedule. * You must generate the billing block and indicate the price of each block.

subscriptions.title: How to create a Subscription?
subscriptions.description: You must choose a name to identify your subscription. * You must select the currency that will be used in the billing block. * You must indicate what types of vehicles will be considered in this schedule.

parking_area.title: How to create a Parking Area?
parking_area.description: You must choose a name to identify your parking area. * You must select or create an area. * You must select or create one or more Schedules that you want to assign to your parking area.

vehicle.title: How to create a Vehicle?
vehicle.description: You must choose a name to identify your vehicle.

inspector.title: How to create an Inspector?
inspector.description: You must fill in the personal data of the inspector. * You must assign the parking areas for this inspector. * You must assign the permissions that this inspector will have.

thrid_party_company.title: How to create Distributors?
thrid_party_company.description: You must fill in the distributor information. * You must indicate the type of commission that the distributor will have.

parking_space.title: How to create/edit Parking Space?
parking_space.description: You must indicate if the parking space will have an assigned sensor. * You must geolocate the parking space.

home.continue_area: Continue with the creation of an Area

configuration.distributors_check: Allow the sales portal for distributors
configuration.distributors_description: This functionality allows the portal to sell metered parking and gives distributors access to an exclusive platform where they can manage their sales and orders, view the product catalog, check the status of their transactions, access special promotions, and generate sales reports. All of this allows them to operate autonomously, optimizing their processes and improving the efficiency of managing their business activities.
configuration.fleet_description: The fleet creation functionality allows users to group several vehicles under a common set, known as a fleet. A fleet is defined as an organized collection of cars or vehicles that belong to a user or company and can be managed centrally. This functionality is designed to facilitate the management of large numbers of vehicles and offer a consolidated view of all the vehicular assets of a user.

cant_delete: cannot be removed because it is being used in a parking area...
